plot: Elena hopes that rain will bring her father back, though she knows him only through the letters he writes to her. But with the rains, Elena will begin an inner journey searching for her roots, traveling from hope to despair.
title: El ladrón de sombras
plot_es: Elena hopes that rain will bring her father back, though she knows him only through the letters he writes to her. But with the rains, Elena will begin an inner journey searching for her roots, traveling from hope to despair.
plot_en: Elena hopes that rain will bring her father back, though she knows him only through the letters he writes to her. But with the rains, Elena will begin an inner journey searching for her roots, traveling from hope to despair.
